segments.text: Good afternoon , Mr . Dome ’ s office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Denise , Mr . Bruce ’ s Secretary . I was calling to confirm his meeting tomorrow with Mr . Dome at 4 o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s confirmed for here in our office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is your address still 1150 Lake Road ?
segments.speaker: S2
